title: How Smart Is Your Home? Outlook For Smart Home Tech
itunes:title: How Smart Is Your Home? Outlook For Smart Home Tech
description:
Aaron Emigh, CEO and Co-Founder of Brilliant, discusses the outlook for the smart home technology market. Josh Wingrove, White House Correspondent for Bloomberg News, talks about President Biden's vaccination mandate for federal employees. Lisa Shalett, Chief Investment Officer at Morgan Stanley Wealth Management, discusses the markets. Nathan Shetty, Head of Multi Asset at Nuveen, talks private markets. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
